title: Best of the Program | 4/5/22
description:
Pat and Stu to discuss Ketanji Brown Jackson’s Supreme Court confirmation hearing and the Republicans who will vote to confirm her. Pat and Stu discuss Republican Maryland Governor Larry Hogan attacking Florida Governor Ron DeSantis for his fight against Disney. Pat and Stu discuss President Biden's approval rating.
